Package utb.fai.natt.spi

Interface INATTContext

public interface INATTContext
Interface for the NATT context. Provides access to various components and functionalities used throughout the testing tool.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearVariables()
    Clears all variables.
    HashMap<String,Class<?>>
    getKeywordSet()
    Gets a reference to the list of all registered keywords.
    IMessageBuffer
    getMessageBuffer()
    Gets the message buffer which contains messages from all modules and external standard streams.
    NATTModule
    getModule(String name)
    Safely retrieves a reference to a specific module by name.
    LinkedList<NATTModule>
    getModules()
    Gets a reference to the list of active modules.
    String
    getVariable(String name)
    Retrieves the value of a specific variable.
    ConcurrentHashMap<String,String>
    getVariables()
    Gets all created variables.
    boolean
    registerKeyword(NATTKeyword keyword)
    Registers a new keyword to the context.
    boolean
    removeModule(String name)
    Remove a module from the context.
    void
    restoreVariablesState()
    Restores variables to the last saved state from history.
    void
    saveVariablesState()
    Saves the current state of variables to history for future restoration.

    Stores a value in a variable.

  • Method Details

    • getKeywordSet

      HashMap<String,Class<?>> getKeywordSet()
      Gets a reference to the list of all registered keywords.

    • registerKeyword

      boolean registerKeyword(NATTKeyword keyword)
      Registers a new keyword to the context.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to register

    • getModules

      LinkedList<NATTModule> getModules()
      Gets a reference to the list of active modules.
      Returns:
      List of active modules

    • removeModule

      boolean removeModule(String name)
      Remove a module from the context.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the module to remove
      Returns:
      true if the module was removed, false otherwise

    • getModule

      NATTModule getModule(String name)
      Safely retrieves a reference to a specific module by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the module to find
      Returns:
      The module reference, or null if not found

    • getMessageBuffer

      IMessageBuffer getMessageBuffer()
      Gets the message buffer which contains messages from all modules and external standard streams.
      Returns:
      IMessageBuffer

    • getVariables

      ConcurrentHashMap<String,String> getVariables()
      Gets all created variables.
      Returns:
      Map of variables

    • clearVariables

      void clearVariables()
      Clears all variables.

    • getVariable

      String getVariable(String name)
      Retrieves the value of a specific variable.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the variable
      Returns:
      The value of the variable

    • storeValueToVariable

      String storeValueToVariable(String name, String value)
      Stores a value in a variable.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the variable (must be a single word, spaces replaced with "_")
      value - The value to store (null will be replaced with an empty string)
      Returns:
      The name of the variable if successfully created, otherwise null

    • saveVariablesState

      void saveVariablesState()
      Saves the current state of variables to history for future restoration.

    • restoreVariablesState

      void restoreVariablesState()
      Restores variables to the last saved state from history.
